replies.body:
According to Champions.GG from the latest patch.

Most popular tops:

Irella
Riven
Vlad
Gnar
Nasus

Most popular mids:

Ahri
LeBlanc
Ekko
Zed
Katarina

Most popular jungle

Lee Sin
Vi
Amumu
Rek'Sai
Gragas

Really? Of Tanks?

> [{quoted}](name=shalexade,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=6ljtWafm,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-06-03T04:29:36.876+0000)
>
> Really? Of Tanks?

While in your list there is actually only 1 tank, but according to the general population of LoL, a lot of them would say there are 9 there on that list.
I'd count Nasus and Amumu as the main tanks while the rest are beefy or not tanks.
All Tops and Jungles you listed are decent tanks/off builds.

Tanks of League,

end of discussion.
